channel.title: American Thinker
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.

item.title: The Epic Failure of the Intel Agencies on the Boston Bombing
item.description: The case is "wide open"? Really? What has American intelligence come to?

item.title: Does Kim Know What Lies Ahead?
item.description: This child has a gun, and also thinks he's god almighty. Time to head for cover.

item.title: Reproductive Justice in Philadelphia
item.description: For decades we've assumed that progressives genuinely did believe that it was a 'blob of tissue' that they were exterminating. Now we see where their true sentiments lie.

item.title: Hiding behind Grieving Mothers
item.description: Obama's new gun-control tactic is the despicable yet -- and that's saying something.

item.title: The Engineer and the Harlot
item.description: In hoarding powers and prerogatives to himself that no president has ever wielded, Obama is taking us to a place of his own choosing: a utopia that more closely resembles Golgotha.

item.title: Am I a Worm-Eating Bigot?
item.description: I want to categorically deny that I am a worm-eating bigot. Worm-eaters are great people.

item.title: What Right of Return?
item.description: There has never in recorded time been a question of absorbing millions of sworn enemies into a host country, much less into a sliver of land the size of Israel, surrounded as it is by innumerable numbers of the same enemy

item.title: President Obama's Plan for A Socialist One Party State
item.description: The last check and balance on President Obama is the Republican majority in the House of Representatives. He has made clear that he intends to remove that check on his power in the 2014 elections.

item.title: Next Up on the Fracking Fear-Mongering List: Earthquakes!
item.description: Linking seismic events to fracking is outright laughable. But that hasn't stopped the eco-warriors from trying.

item.title: Michael Bloomberg's Gun Stings
item.description: If this were another issue, the MSM would call this a "witch-hunt."

item.title: The Uncanny Union of Kermit and Miss Maggie
item.description: Kermit Gosnell is the end game in a natural progression that the eugenic philosophies of Margaret Sanger set into motion.

item.title: Kermit Gosnell: Secret Hero of the Left
item.description: Here is a man who epitomizes the post-abortion rights mentality. For pro-choice crusaders, what's not to love?

item.title: Ending the Violence
item.description: Focusing on two particular factors could go a long way to end the epidemic of school shootings.

item.title: Two New Palestinian Myths
item.description: The Palestinians take two more steps into fantasyland.

item.title: Before the Gosnell Blackout, There Was Tiller's
item.description: ...and Carhart's, and Allred's, and Patterson's, and Biskind's, and Rotem's, and...

item.title: Maryland's Second Amendment Nightmare: Coming Soon to a State Near You?
item.description: Conservatives in red states would be very unwise to think that they're safe from the encroachments now plaguing the so-called "Free State."

item.title: Are We Being Compromised by Barack Obama's Murky Past?
item.description: Among all the foreign intelligence agencies, Russian intelligence (SVR) has a long history and has made a science of studying the backgrounds of American presidents. They almost certainly know more than we do about our president.

item.title: How Barack Obama Is Using Health Care to Balkanize America
item.description: And what we can do about it.

item.title: Gun Control Derangement Syndrome
item.description: Congress goes down the rabbit hole with the Toomey/Manchin gun-control bill.

item.title: The Rising Price of Civilization
item.description: Latter-day lawmakers never seem to remember that this nation was founded by a bloody revolution caused, in part, by unreasonable taxation.

item.title: Do Left-Wing Professors Really 'Proselytize' on Campus?
item.description: The real story, from someone who's been there a few decades.

item.title: Boola, Boola, Save Your Moolah
item.description: The universities may be intent on diving headfirst into oblivion, but there's no reason why alumni ought to follow them.

item.title: Truth in Fables: Why Progressives Hate Aesop
item.description: Better to read library regulations, say pushers of Common Core.

item.title: How to Bring Middle East Peace and Stability
item.description: Every administration from President Carter to the present has failed to come to grips with the fact that Iran is at war with us.

item.title: 'Last Men' and Atheists
item.description: Arguing with atheists ia largely a waste of time -- though it does help clarify the thinking.
